ygData.subject: Re: Enchanter Nerf Protest.
ygData.msgSnippet: Another way to go is for all enchanters to meet in one place and then sit for an hour or something. ... From: Miller, Keith A. [mailto:keithm@uillinois.edu]
ygData.messageBody:
Another way to go is for all enchanters to meet in one place and then
sit for an hour or something.

-----Original Message-----
From: Miller, Keith A. [mailto:keithm@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 20, 1999 1:05 PM
To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com'
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Enchanter Nerf Protest.


From: "Miller, Keith A." <keithm@...>

I think you will be suprised how few enchanters over L8 will be playing.
I
hope you support the protest. Make a troll and bash things for a bit,
always good for a change of pace.

-----Original Message-----
From: Silverlock [mailto:croesus@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 20, 1999 2:59 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Enchanter Nerf Protest.


From: Silverlock <croesus@...>

At 08:35 AM 5/20/99 -0500, you wrote:

Bah? Only if you and others don't support it. Eqstratics and Not crazy
have
already posted blurbs about the strike.
I will be logging today on every server and tellling any enchanters
about
the strike. Go ahead and send email, go ahead and petition, but don't
derail
a strike a lot of us are working hard to get going.

>From: Ric R <redr@...>
>
>I think we all should send feedback as well as write up a bug report as
to
>the current nerfing of our class. As for a day we do not play our
>Enchanter, BAH! Between people who dont know about the day, or ppl who
just
>dont care, there will be Enchanters playing period. What is most
important
>is Veriant hears our upset with the most recent changes, send em email,
>send feedback and write up a bug report. The more people that do, the
>chances are something will be done.
>
>Another thing along the same lines, I'd like to know where Veriant is
>telling us of these changes vs. just putting them in and us finding out
as
>we play. If anyone know's please post it.
>
>
>
>Telan Ka`Rlaah of Rellos Zek
>
>
>
>-----------------------------------------------------------------------
-
>It's finally here! What's your opinion?
>http://www.onelist.com
>Create a Star Wars discussion group at ONElist.
>
>
--
Silverlock, ICQ 474725
